website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy cavitation device for the face and body, but it requires a healthy diet and exercise to really show results.
pros: Suitable for use on arms, belly, hips, thighs, chin, and jaw
Also provides EMS and blue/red light treatments
cons: Device is small, so it can take some time to treat a larger area like the belly or hips

customer_reviews.title: reduces how fat you look
customer_reviews.text: I got this to assist with my weight loss regimen. After reading up on how to use these things I found that this was moderately helpful in improving my leg aesthetics especially my thick thighs. There is a learning curve to this device but search up some tutorial videos if you need additional guidance, it worked for me
customer_reviews.author: Jada River

customer_reviews.title: Burn fat like a pro
customer_reviews.text: This was super helpful in my lazy lifestyle. It worked perfectly and makes me look better as well.
customer_reviews.author: GOHARD

customer_reviews.title: Confused/keep turning off
customer_reviews.text: I received my package on Friday but didn't open it or use it until Saturday afternoon like 2:15pm...... so far the I have only use it twice and for those two time the machine kept on going off without me turning it off and the manual really don't show what setting it be on when working on the stomach area so really I don't know if I'll doing it right. I am going to use the machine one more time if it continues to go off I'll return it back...... I have heard good things about this machine so I really hope it works and I get to keep it
customer_reviews.author: rugi

customer_reviews.title: not working at all
customer_reviews.text: I would have to return this one, it does not heat up at all. I have read and re-read the instructions. It is suppose to sizzle when a few drops of water are put on it, nothing like that happens at all. Just a waste of money!! I will re-package this up and return it!!
customer_reviews.author: Maja Cristobal

customer_reviews.title: A very good fat reduce tool
customer_reviews.text: I've been gaining so much fat since staying at home. And it is so hard to work out at home. I bought this product just want to give it a try. So far it is very useful. I tried a week and lost 3lbs. Although it seems you won't lose you weight a lot, the fat did reduce. Before my belly is loose, but now is much better. This is the most important thing that I care. I will keep using it for a long period and see what is the results going be. I have a little confident that I can lose my fat!!
customer_reviews.author: sophie

customer_reviews.title: Waste!
customer_reviews.text: Awful! I purchased this item as when I opened the package to use it I didn’t feel much heat, or any type of inkling the item was on. I tried to use it more then once, yet the plate remained very cold and the buttons starting lighting up and going off on its own. TERRIBLE AND NOT WORTH RHE MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: Janine Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Works very well. Definitely recommend it
customer_reviews.text: 100% worth the money. It says you see the results until 1 month of use, but I can see some results already. It was as it is described and I’m happy with it. It arrived quickly too. I didn’t know this, but it also says it helps with acne. I’m definitely going try that next and hope I get similar results as the ones I’ve been seeing lately.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: It's a great product to be honest,
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product and I'm not sure if it actually eliminates fat, but any help is always good.I did a lot of research before I bought it, and it has several different features, so it's worth buying.I have bought one of the best home products so far!Helps cells grow and proliferate;High frequency vibration can help you lose weight;Blue light therapy kills bacteria and acne;Although it takes time and time, I believe the stubborn belly fat has improved, and I will keep updating it as I see how it works.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Day

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: worth the price. I love the packaging box, is a gift box! I was looking a device to reduce my stretch mark and shape my body after I gave birth to my son. My husband bought this for me. After using 5 weeks, it help me to lighten my stretch mark. Will keep to use and recommend this for my sister, she also gave birth to her son
customer_reviews.author: CATHERINE

customer_reviews.title: Helps with stomach fat
customer_reviews.text: This is not an heat fat burning which cause an small burn or uncomfortable when apply it in the skin. It is using infrared to burn the fat below the skin so you wont feel anything when apply this treatment
customer_reviews.author: Luis  Almanzan

customer_reviews.title: Useful!
customer_reviews.text: I am 30, and facing some skin problems like a slight of face slacking and smile lines, so I want to begin to use some electrical product to add in my skin care routine. I decided to try this one because it’s functional, developing skin to absorb essential oil. The package is nice, and comes with a user manual.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Hopeful
customer_reviews.text: It’s to early to say how well it works but I’m hopeful. I got the fat burning machine to help with that wonderful gift from my kids the wave/pouch I have on the very low tummy are. Nothing works to get ride of it and I never had it before my 3 amazing kiddos. I love them but not that pouch haha. I didn’t even notice until reading direction I can use it on my face. So total bonus! I added a lil video because I wasn’t convinced it was really on, doing anything until I tried the water trick.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda L Severson

customer_reviews.title: Has multi functions
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this one want to work on my tummy but after I bought it and I found it can also working my the face for face lift. I’m really excited and hopefully It can my help burn some fat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very affective
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to follow instructions and we use the fat burn machine on our abdomen and legs. It can help us get Slimming body with no effort. I do recommend this machine.Using a good quality body cream and the device with the right frequency is certainly possible to see results.It works great and i really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph  Perez

customer_reviews.title: My body’s dream machine
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome investment! First , the packaging on opening was elegantly set. I first read the instructions to make sure I understand all the functions. And they are fully understandable. There’s timeline involving facial and body care which I have jumped into getting ready into going into week2. I already smoother skin in the areas around my cheeks and acne scares by using the red light feature. I look forward to weeks ahead.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I didn't really expect this to work. Well, let's say I had moderate expectations for an at-home device. But after just three days my legs are noticeably smoother! Much less dimply! It takes a good hour out of the day, but isn't the most annoying beauty chore and at least I don't have to go to a salon and pay more $.This machine at this price point is working out fine.This massager machine is in a good size for carry-on to traveling. The product not only can use for the face but also for the whole body. Also, the machine has 6 different lights representative skincare. of course, you need to keep using it to see the effect.
customer_reviews.author: Kimbrough

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: The instructions don’t even make sense, but I’ve been using this for a few months now and I don’t notice any significant changes. Wish I could return but they don’t give you enough time between purchasing/actually getting to see if it works!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Saathoff

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: I have used this device twice in a week on my tights. it wont give a dramatic result right away so I will keep using it at lease 1-2 times a week and update with result. I do love how it feel when massaging. easy to operate, has infrared light which is good for skin too.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Velez

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if mine arrived defective- but this thing doesn’t do a thing! Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: amber f

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: This is for more for customer service. Thank you for finding my return. I’ll give five stars for customer service.
customer_reviews.author: need help

customer_reviews.title: This machine is very painless and comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.text: When you receive the goods, you open it immediately. The packaging is very beautiful, especially suitable for giving a friend as a gift. It quickly adapts to use.
customer_reviews.author: labby zheng

customer_reviews.title: doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: It is not even getting hot nor is it doing what it suppose to do. It doesn't work. I want a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Machine is defective. Kept shutting off on me and now won't come on at all.
customer_reviews.author: Keisha Vinales

customer_reviews.title: Is it supposed to get hot or warm?
customer_reviews.text: Is it suppose to get hot hot? ...cause it barely even feels warm. If so maybe it’s broken.
customer_reviews.author: ParadiseVee Cosmetics

customer_reviews.title: It’s easy to work
customer_reviews.text: Using this product for a while and I’m happy with the results so far
customer_reviews.author: Josefa

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to give it a try, it’s super fast shipping even with regular account. Tried it for a few days and I lost a few lbs, average 1 lb per day, it’s perfect for lazy me, no exercise! It seems like not showing a lot, but the fat did reduce a little. I also used as facial, it makes my face look slim. I definitely going to use for long term to get better result. Easy direction and lightweight. Love it! Love it! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Christy H. Ma

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I've used it all over my body but am focusing on one area at the time, currently my face. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Pia

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like how small this device is for larger areas like hip, butt. It takes forever. I wish they had in bigger size. I haven’t used it for long so can’t say if it works or nit.
customer_reviews.author: jayshri

customer_reviews.title: Will not work
customer_reviews.text: This may help only for face skin, bit dissapointed with the claims
customer_reviews.author: Baazeegar

customer_reviews.title: It's crazy bur it works
customer_reviews.text: I had seen so many of these on Instagram and i finally just did it and got it. I bought an oil to use with it and I have to admit it works. I've been working out for so long and there were areas that just wouldn't change and when i used this i couldn't believe how it was working. Took about a month but I did see results from this alone so I would absolutely recommend. It doesn't hurt at all you barely feel it but its doing the job.
customer_reviews.author: Mariela D'amico

customer_reviews.title: Looking better then before Covid!
customer_reviews.text: After a month it seems to be working or at least helping in my weight loss. My skin around belly and thighs are looking better and tighter. Googling and watching YouTube videos for tips and tricks seemed to help me.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Graves

customer_reviews.title: Gimick
customer_reviews.text: If it sounds too good to be true then it is...
customer_reviews.author: Noel
